Defines lower threshold of available disk space for deleting least-recently accessed studies: if the average available disk space on storage filesystems falls below MinFreeDiskSpace * FreeDiskSpaceLowerThreshold, least-recently accessed studies will be deleted.
FreeDiskSpaceLowerThreshold float
Defines upper threshold of available disk space for deleting least-recently accessed studies: least-recently accessed studies will be deleted, until the average available disk space on storage filesystems exceeds MinFreeDiskSpace * FreeDiskSpaceUpperThreshold.
FreeDiskSpaceUpperThreshold float
Enables deletion of objects in local filesystems of Studies which are retrieveable from an external Retrieve AE. DB Entries for the Studies will not be removed!
FlushStudiesExternalRetrievable boolean
Enables deletion of objects in local filesystems of Studies stored on media (offline storage). DB Entries for the Studies will not be removed!
FlushStudiesOnMedia boolean
Enables deletion of least-recently accessed studies for which no storage commitment request was received. Deletes files AND database entries! Do only activate if you know what you are doing!
DeleteStudiesStorageNotCommited boolean
Defines how long a study may not be accessed, before it will be deleted if it match one of the configured conditions: FlushStudiesExternalRetrievable, FlushStudiesOnMedia and DeleteStudiesStorageNotCommited. Format: ##h (in hours), ##d (in days), ##w (in weeks) NEVER (= deletion of studies is only triggered by running out of disk space).
StudyCacheTimeout java.lang.String
Interval in which unreferenced Files are purged from the filesystem. Format: ##s (in seconds), ##m (in minutes), ##h (in hours) NEVER (= disable deletion of unreferenced Files).
PurgeFilesInterval java.lang.String
Limit number of unreferenced Files that are purged from the filesystem in one purge task.
PurgeFilesLimit int
Interval in which available disk space is checked for necessity to free disk space by deletion of least-recently accessed studies. FreeDiskSpaceInterval shall be greater than PurgeFilesInterval. Format: ##s (in seconds), ##m (in minutes), ##h (in hours). NEVER (= no deletion of studies).
